release.notes:
Matrix #s etched; <(PR) P> etched (

very lightly); stamped, "PR" in label matrix denotes a [l130920] pressing [r=7699944] has no "PR" in the label matrix and 1 pressing ring. [r=5251801] has no "PR" in the label matrix and 2 pressing rings. Luther Vandross appears courtesy of Ceilidh Productions. Produced by Nile Rodgers and Bernard Edwards for The Chic Organization Ltd., In association with Marc Kreiner and Tom Cossie for MK Productions All selections published by Chic Music, Inc./Cotillion Music, BMI. Inner sleeve: Printed in U.S.A. SD 19209 Rear sleeve: ℗ © 1978 Atlantic Recording Corporation (...) Printed in U.S.A. Some copies may have a post manufacturing gold promotional stamp.
